ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Pegasus suddenly came upon a mountain.  In the future, it would be known as Mt. St. Hillary.  But right now, it was the Maximal base, as well as the crash zone

Pegasus suddenly came upon a mountain.  In the future, it would be known as
Mt. St. Hillary.  But right now, it was the Maximal base, as well as the
crash zone of the Autobot space cruiser called "The Ark."  Pegasus slowed
down as he came within range of the base.

~I hope they don't mistake me for a Predacon and decide to blast me.~

Slowly, he walked up to the entrance of the cave.

"Hello?"  Pegasus called cautiously, "anyone home?"
